gamification.title: Earn Rewards for Contributions
gamification.subtitle: Join our community and earn points, badges and recognition for your contributions to the world of symbols

badges.title: Collect Badges
badges.description: Earn unique badges for your achievements and showcase them on your profile

points.title: Earn Points
points.description: Gain points for every contribution, comment, and validation you make

leaderboard.title: Climb Leaderboards
leaderboard.description: Compete with other contributors and climb the global and regional leaderboards

achievements.title: Complete Achievements
achievements.description: Complete special challenges to unlock unique rewards and recognition
